Description.Name: Buried Riches
Description.Details:
<color=#BFBFBF>A short, text-only transmission arrives on the command line—no formal greeting, no signature, but unmistakably from Arelle.</color>

<color=#DFDFDF>“Analysis underway. Initial scans of the convoy wreckage show shipments of an unidentified high-density metalalloy—extremely durable under heat and kinetic stress. Its origin appears natural, but application unknown. Further study required.”</color>

<color=#BFBFBF>Another line appears moments later.</color>

<color=#DFDFDF>“The mine must be neutralized. It runs deep, too deep to collapse conventionally. However, its above-ground infrastructure includes all atmospheric regulation systems. Remove those, and operations will become untenable. Prepare for immediate deployment.”</color>

Description.Name: Move on to the next contract
Move on to the next contract
Description.Details: [A new contract is available in the Command Center]
